thread.title: Former Bill Da'Norris Searcy talks "Music City Miracle"
thread.title_full: Former Bill Da'Norris Searcy talks "Music City Miracle"

title: Former Bill Da'Norris Searcy talks "Music City Miracle"
text:
Former Bill Da'Norris Searcy talks "Music City Miracle" 
Updated: Fri, Oct 09 2015, 04:41 PM 
Stream WZTV Fox 17 Newscasts LIVE starting with Fox 17 This Morning at 4:30am, News at 5:30pm and News at 9pm & 10 pm 

The Buffalo Bills currently have the longest playoff drought in the NFL. Their last postseason appearance coming in 1999-2000. That's the season the Tennessee Titans pulled off their greatest play in franchise history to end the Bills playoff hopes. 
With the two teams set to play again this weekend, FOX 17's Paul Jones catches up with Titans safety Da'Norris Searcy. Searcy played for the Bills last season and sheds some light on how the "Music City Miracle" is remembered in Buffalo. 
Paul knew the answer to his question before he ever asked it. 

Follow the FOX 17 Sports Team on Twitter: Paul Jones | Dan Phillips | Dave Foster
